The catechist catechized, or, An examination of an Anabaptistical catechism pretended to be published for the satisfaction and information of the people of God in Lancashire &c. : also some observations both old and new concerning the pretended visibility ... of the present Roman Church and religion / sent to a gentleman upon his revolt to popery and now published for the churches good by Richard Hollingworth. Hollingworth, Richard, 1607-1656.
[6], 51 p.
Printed by J.M. for Luke Fawn, London : 1653.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
